resources.string: There is a field that contains 30 cards. Each card might be winning, losing or super winning. By flipping each winning or super winning card, your win coefficient increases. By flipping losing card, game ends. Keep flipping cards to increase your win rate or collect reward to not risk
After collecting your reward, you have a chance to spin an wheel and multiply your reward from 2 to 6 times, but you also have a chance to lose everything!
There are only 3 variants of existing cards
There are also 3 difficulty levels in the game. The differences between them are only in amount of losing cards. 5 on low difficulty, 10 on normal difficulty and 15 on hard difficulty

The winning card (left one) will multiply your win rate by 1.1 on low difficulty, 1.2 on normal difficulty and 1.3 on hard difficulty. The losing card (right one) ends game, reward disappears! The super winning card increases your rate by 1.0 on low difficulty, 2.0 on normal difficulty and 3.0 on hard difficulty
You lost, but you have a chance to withdraw your winnings. Open the correct card to withdraw
The one round of bonus game has a price
The bonus game! The rules are the same as the rock paper scissors rules. Here you can see the diagram that shows us what beats what. If you win, reward doubles!
You can make a mistake 2 times. You have total 3 lives, by losing third one - game ends, or you will get a chance to play bonus game. Win it and get 1 extra life
